CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the View Advertisement stage positioned above or below the Complete Purchase stage?
SRP.A: The View Advertisement stage is positioned {above} the Complete Purchase stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Initiate Checkout?
VE.A: The value of stage Initiate Checkout is {2215}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage View Advertisement?
VE.A: The value of stage View Advertisement is {7417}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is View Advertisement, with a value of {7417}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Complete Purchase, with a value of {956}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Add to Wishlist to stage Add to Cart?
SC.A: Decreased by {1350} Users from stage Add to Wishlist to stage Add to Cart.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 4598? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {View Advertisement} stage has {7417}, the {Visit Product Page} stage has {5167}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 1687? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Enter Payment Information} stage has {1159}, the {Complete Purchase} stage has {956}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 2447 and 3354? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Add to Wishlist to Add to Cart, or from stage Visit Product Page to Add to Wishlist?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Add to Wishlist} to {Add to Cart} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Add to Cart to Initiate Checkout, or from stage Add to Wishlist to Add to Cart?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Add to Wishlist} to {Add to Cart} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Enter Payment Information to Complete Purchase, from stage View Advertisement to Visit Product Page, or from stage Add to Cart to Initiate Checkout?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {View Advertisement} to stage {Visit Product Page} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {View Advertisement} and {Visit Product Page} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Enter Payment Information} and {Complete Purchase} stages.
